conv_purpose: The user aims to gather creative ideas and inspiration for selecting a unique movie to watch, which aligns with their entertainment preferences.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user inquires about unique and lesser-known movie recommendations that provide a fresh perspective and are particularly entertaining.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt establishes the initial inquiry, focusing on discovering movies that are less mainstream and deliver a unique experience.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user follows the last round dialogue by asking for specific genre suggestions that fit the criteria mentioned, and inquires about any film that combines elements of surprise with an engaging storyline.
summarized prompts.explanation: Following the initial broad recommendations, the user narrows down their preferences to specific genres and elements, introducing additional constraints about storyline and surprises, in alignment with the 'follow-up' structure.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user follows the last round dialogue by expressing interest in movies with strong character development and asks for recommendations that emphasize character growth alongside entertainment value.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user continues to add more specific requirements, this time focusing on character development, which is in line with the 'follow-up' conversational structure, as it builds on the previous constraints.

conv_task: Open-ended Questions: The user seeks subjective advice, inspiration, or insights, with no single correct answer.

conv_purpose: The user wants to explore the concept of motivation in psychology and understand its application in different scenarios.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user inquires about the foundational theories of motivation in psychology.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt initiates the conversation by asking for an overview of a broad topic, setting the stage for further exploration.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user expands on the subtopic of self-determination theory mentioned previously in c1 by asking how it can be applied in educational settings.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user is expanding on the themes discussed by delving deeper into a specific theory introduced in the previous conversation.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user expands on the subtopic of intrinsic vs. extrinsic motivation mentioned previously in c1 by asking how these concepts affect employee performance in workplaces.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user continues to expand on related themes by exploring another subtopic initially introduced in the first conversation, now focusing on a different application context.

conv_task: Open-ended Questions: The user seeks subjective advice, inspiration, or insights, with no single correct answer.

conv_purpose: User explores different aspects of integrating minimalism into a daily lifestyle, seeking advice and insights on simplifying routines.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks for general advice on how to begin incorporating minimalism into their daily lifestyle.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt reflects an open-ended question where the user seeks subjective advice, aligning with the 'Clear Purpose Dialogue' by setting the stage for a purposeful exploration of lifestyle changes.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user follows up by requesting more specific examples of minimalist routines for morning activities.
summarized prompts.explanation: The follow-up nature is evident as the user builds on the previous discussion about minimalism by narrowing the focus to specific daily routines, introducing additional constraints around morning activities.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the focus from 'morning activities' to 'evening routines' to gain insights into simplifying the end-of-day processes.
summarized prompts.explanation: In this refinement step, the user changes the constraint from morning to evening routines, maintaining the overall lifestyle topic while shifting the focus to different times of day.

conv_task: Open-ended Questions: The user seeks subjective advice, inspiration, or insights, with no single correct answer.

conv_purpose: The user explores different perspectives on the evolution of music genres over time.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks about the general history and evolution of music genres.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt initiates the conversation, establishing the main topic of music and seeking an overview of its historical development.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the prompt to focus on specific stylistic changes within the history of music genres to gain a deeper understanding of influential shifts.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user revises the initial broad inquiry to emphasize a particular aspect of music history, which is stylistic changes, aligning with the refinement structure.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user seeks a summary of the different stylistic changes discussed in previous turns to create a cohesive overview of how music genres have evolved stylistically.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt consolidates the discussed themes and changes in music genres into a cohesive summary, reflecting the summary structure.

conv_task: Open-ended Questions: The user seeks subjective advice, inspiration, or insights, with no single correct answer.

conv_purpose: The user seeks holistic insights on maintaining mental well-being through various life stages, adjusting queries to refine understanding and achieve a comprehensive summary.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks for general advice on maintaining mental health across different life stages.
summarized prompts.explanation: The initial prompt sets the stage for an open-ended conversation about mental health, aligning with the dialogue type of seeking subjective advice.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the request by asking for strategies in a more informal and relatable tone instead of general advice.
summarized prompts.explanation: This follows the 'Refinement' structure as the user adjusts the tone to make the response more engaging and accessible.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user seeks a summary of the strategies and insights provided in the previous responses to form a cohesive understanding.
summarized prompts.explanation: This is aligned with the 'Summary' structure, where the user consolidates information from past dialogues for a comprehensive overview.
